page.title: 15BELVOIR HOSPITAL.
page.content: Belvoir Park Hospital is infact made up of two different centres.These are the fever hospitals which deal with infectious diseases and the Northern Ireland Radiotherapy centre which deals with all cases of cancer.The fever hospital was opened in 1904 and was a total of 10 wards , it has four senior house officers ,one registrar and two consultant physicians which treat approximatly 65 people a week.The kind of infectious diseases that are treated in the fever hospital are chest infections, salmonella , infective hepatitis and cardiacs. The Radiotherapy centre was opened in 1956 and until then the grounds were originally part of the fever hospital.
